revised_title: Descending Degenerations Following Lesions in the Gyrus Marginalis and Gyrus Fornicatus in Monkeys: An Appendix
tldr: This study investigates the degenerations resulting from lesions in the gyrus marginalis and gyrus fornicatus in monkeys. The results suggest a differentiation in the pyramidal tract, with the whole area degenerating when both external and mesial motor areas are removed, while only a corresponding part degenerates after removal of one area.
